LockRecord.description: The vaccination applied to this dog.
LockRecord.longDescription: This type shall contain the vaccination applied to this dog.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LockType.description: The name of a vaccination applied to this dog.
LockType.longDescription: This property shall contain the standard medical name for the vaccination applied to this dog.

ResourceID.description: The name of a vaccination applied to this dog.
ResourceID.longDescription: This property shall contain the standard medical name for the vaccination applied to this dog.

SegmentFlags.longDescription: This property shall contain a longer description of the sample property.

LockRequest.description: The LockRequest schema defines the properties of a Management Console LockRequest attached to a system.
LockRequest.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a Management Console LockRequest attached to a system.

title: #LockRequest
